title: Patricof's Concerns Over Build Back Better’s Taxes
itunes:title: Patricof's Concerns Over Build Back Better’s Taxes
description:
Alan Patricof, Chairman Emeritus & Co-Founder at Greycroft, discusses how a change to the Qualified Small Business Stock tax could stifle innovation.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
